attributes.additional_details: Often we see where foot ballers and other well off people are fined less than £200 this is no punishment to the well off.
attributes.background: All fines should be income related. Fines are a punishment and should be that for everyone. A £200 for minimum waged is a punishment however not if that person earns £200,000 it is not. It is not right to punish the poor and not the well off.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly which fines you would like to be income-related. The Government is only responsible for fines issued by the Government, and is not responsible for other fines - for example, fines set by local councils or private organisations.
